newsitem.title: UK: Canadian-born professor to head UK pay commission.
newsitem.headline: Canadian-born professor to head UK pay commission.

text.p: The British government is to name Professor George Bain, principal of the London Business School, as chairman of the Low Pay Commission, a government spokeswoman said on Sunday.
The commission will have the task of recommending a level for a statutory minimum wage which the new Labour government plans to introduce. The appointment is expected to be confirmed on Monday.
Professor Bain, who came to Britain from Canada more than 30 years ago, is an expert on industrial relations and a former head of the business school at the University of Warwick in central England.
